Articles.Content: http://en.akinator.com/ try it out. it can guess allmost any character or person you can ever think of, and beleve it or not it works on our fav green ailiens to.
I beat it with Mr. Hanky from south park.

It took it two guesses to figure out HAL from 2001, the first time it guessed Megatron =P

Also it guessed Adam Jensen correctly in only 11 questions, I was pretty impressed
Yup, I can still find harvesteR on here
